attributes.action: stop politicians taking holidays at the public expense
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Certain politicians have been to Fiji and other exotic locations during the recess on "fact finding missions" at least one politician who went on this "fact finding mission" is standing down at the next elections. This is a waste of public money at a time when people are loosing their jobs and houses - confidence with the government is at an all time low caused by such actions - bring some reality into the political arena and prevent this abuse of position, power and public money

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
